catalog_info.title: Beginning Swedish Language and Literature
catalog_info.notes: M. through Th., at 9 Not open to auditors.
catalog_info.description: Continuation of the basic course focusing on a basic mastery of listening, speaking, reading, and writing skills. During spring term, the emphasis is on more advanced conversation and an exploration of Sweden's culture and civilization through selected texts and video. By semester's end, students will be able to carry on conversations in everyday Swedish, read news articles, and write letters and produce substantial creative work.
